In this case, the context indicates that myotonia is being used as a disease entity because it is the primary focus of the clinical examination and EMG (electromyography), which are methods used to diagnose diseases or conditions.

Therefore, the identified "Disease" entity in the paragraph is:

* Myotonia
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Disease.
